://github.com/\w+/\w+
^(?:https\??|data):\S*[*+]$
^..:0.Xx\S*}\\b$
catching 'templatesz'
\\templates(?![a-z])
# action.yml check_extra_dictionaries
      cspell:\w+/[\w/]+\.txt$
# perl include flags
-Ilib\b
# dig flags
 \+no
# META.json
"author"  : ".*"
# cspell action.yml entries
^\s*cspell:.*\.txt$

# Refresh cspell dictionaries commit message
^\* [a-z/.]+$
